import React from "react"; import "./hero.scss" import pause from "../../assets/Images/Icons/pause.svg" import play from "../../assets/Images/Icons/play.svg" import fullscreen from "../../assets/Images/Icons/fullscreen.svg" import volumeOff from "../../assets/Images/Icons/volume_off.svg" import volumeUp from "../../assets/Images/Icons/volume_up.svg" import scrub from "../../assets/Images/Icons/scrub.svg" const Hero = ({hero}) => { const heroContent = hero.map((object,id)=>{ return(
); }) return
{heroContent}
} export default Hero;
